home_view.intro_description: Cnote is a simple and efficient browser extension that helps users clip content from web pages into Markdown notes. It supports multi-format export and cloud synchronization to keep your notes accessible across devices.

features_list.step1: üìù Select text from web pages and save it as a note in Markdown format.
features_list.step2: üìë Export notes in multiple formats: .md, .pdf, .html, .docx, and .txt.
features_list.step3: ‚òÅÔ∏è Save notes to the cloud for seamless synchronization across devices.
features_list.step4: üñ±Ô∏è Quick right-click menu: 'Add to New Note' option.
features_list.step5: üé® Markdown editor with a real-time preview.

chrome_installation.step1_after: to download and install the extension.
chrome_installation.step2: Once installed, right-click on any selected text and choose 'Add to New Note.'

edge_installation.step2: Follow the instructions to install and start using the extension.
